parameter.value: Digite o nome do local que deseja se teletransportar: {Earth}, {Sand City}, {M2}, {Tsufur}, {Zelta}, {Vegeta}, {Namek}, {Lude}, {Premia}, {Boar's Island}, {Ruudo}, {City 17}, {Boss City}, {Arena Quest}, {Gardia}, {Bills Island} , {halloween City} , {Mordor} , {Croner Invasion} , {Kanasa}, {Multi Wolrd} , {Multi Wolrd} , {Arabian City} , {Ice Kong City} , {Flasher City} , {Vehemence City} , {stream city} , {Kazhel} , {Divindade City} , {Dabura island} , {Quest Ultragod} , {Frozen island} , {Monaka Island} .
